DHANYABAD-----3-PRADESH ME SWAROJGAR YOGNA KE ANTARGAT BORVEL VIKAS AUR GREEN HOUSE KE BADLAV KE LIYE 75 % ANUDAN AUR PHAL PAUDH ROPAN YOJNA KE TAHAT 90 % ANUDAN DIYA JAYEGA UTTARAKHAND KI MANDI KA RATE JANNE KE LIYE 1800-102-4608 PAR SAMPARK KARE
